statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

article.description: Alpha Diallo hit a go-ahead jumper with 2:22 left in overtime and fifth-seeded Providence rallied from a 17-point second-half deficit to stun top-seeded and No. 3 Xavier 75-72 in the semifinals of the Big East tournament on Friday night.

video.headline: Cartwright shines for Providence in OT victory
video.caption: Kyron Cartwright dominates in overtime with some big game-saving plays on both sides of the court to lift Providence past No. 3 Xavier.
video.description: Kyron Cartwright dominates in overtime with some big game-saving plays on both sides of the court to lift Providence past No. 3 Xavier.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (Cartwright shines for Providence in OT victory) 2018/03/09 ESHEET

video.title: Cartwright shines for Providence in OT victory

article.headline: Friars stun Musketeers in OT to reach Big East title game

images.name: Cartwright shines for Providence in OT victory
images.caption: Kyron Cartwright dominates in overtime with some big game-saving plays on both sides of the court to lift Providence past No. 3 Xavier.

article.linkText: Providence, down 17, rallies past No. 3 Xavier
article.story:
NEW YORK -- Alpha Diallo hit a go-ahead jumper with 2:22 left in overtime and fifth-seeded Providence rallied from a 17-point second-half deficit to stun top-seeded and No. 3 Xavier 75-72 in the semifinals of the Big East tournament on Friday night.

Kyron Cartwright hit a clutch jumper with 55 seconds to go and took an offensive foul on a layup attempt by J.P. Macura with eight seconds to play as the Friars (21-12) beat the Musketeers (28-5) for the second time in three games this season.

This one was totally unexpected after the opening 25 minutes at Madison Square Garden. The win sent Providence to the title game against the winner of the second semifinal between second-seeded and No. 2 Villanova and sixth-seeded Butler.

Cartwright's jumper gave Providence a 73-70 lead, but Trevon Bluiett cut the margin to a point with two free throws with 41 seconds to go.

Isaiah Jackson missed a layup attempt with about 12 seconds to play and the Musketeers rushed the ball upcourt. Macura went to the rim, but Cartwright stood his ground and drew the offensive foul call from referee Jeff Anderson.

Diallo added two free throws with six seconds to go, but Xavier didn't get off a final shot until after the final buzzer when Kerem Kanter hit a shot.

By that time, Providence players were running on the court to celebrate at half court after their second overtime victory in as many days. The Friars edged fourth-seeded Creighton 72-68 on Thursday.

Rodney Bullock, who blocked a potential winning layup attempt by Macura at the end of regulation, and Diallo each had 17 points. Cartwright finished with 15 and Nate Watson, who was a monster in the lane in the second half, had 10 of his 14.

Kanter finished with 18 points for Xavier, which was 9-of-33 in the second half, including 2-of-11 from long range. Bluiett had 13 on 2-of-14 shooting. Freshman Paul Scruggs had a career-high 15 points on his birthday, including 13 in the first half when Xavier built a 14-point lead.

Providence, which is seeking its fifth straight NCAA tournament berth, staged one of the best comebacks in Big East tournament history, rallying from a 17-point second-half deficit to tie the score three times in the final 3:45.

The last time came when Cartwright hit two free throws with 13 seconds to go to knot the score at 68.

After electing not to call a timeout, Xavier rushed the ball up the floor and Macura's layup attempt was blocked by Bullock just before the final horn.

The Friars had used 29-12 run to tie the score at 64-all on jumper by Bullock with 3:45 to play. Cartwright had eight points in the run and Watson seven.

A 3-pointer by Macura with 14:45 had extended the Musketeers' lead to 52-35.

GAME NOTES


Celebrating his 65th birthday, Xavier President Fr. Michael Graham was at the game. ... Seton Hall coach Kevin Willard, who had hoped his third-seeded Pirates would be in the semifinals, was added to the Fox Sports pregame show after the Pirates lost to Butler in the quarterfinals.

UP NEXT

Providence: Will play in the title game against either second-seeded and No. 2 Villanova or Butler on Saturday evening. This is its third trip to the championship game, and it won the other two (1994 and 2014).

Xavier: Will probably get a No. 1 seed in the NCAA tournament.

videos.headline: Xavier shines early with back-to-back dunks
videos.description: Quentin Goodin and Paul Scruggs steal the ball and speed down the court for two powerful slam dunks in the first half against Providence.

videos.headline: Jones shows off dance moves after epic flush
videos.description: Xavier's J.P. Macura dishes it to Tyrique Jones who drives down the lane, throws down an aggressive slam dunk and gets fouled for a chance at a 3-point play.

videos.headline: Macura, Goodin capitalize off Providence turnover for nice basket
videos.description: J.P. Macura intercepts the ball then races to the other side and finds Quentin Goodin who lays it in at the end of the first half.

videos.headline: Diallo scores nice bucket in transition for Providence
videos.description: Xavier loses the ball then Kyron Cartwright gets it, bounces a pass to Alpha Diallo who makes a layup and gets fouled.

videos.headline: Xavier's Macura gets in air for strong block
videos.description: Kyron Cartwright's layup is rejected by J.P. Macura who elevates to swat the ball away.

videos.headline: Providence's Cartwright explodes for big dunk
videos.description: Kyron Cartwright attacks the rim with a mean one-handed slam to shrink Providence's deficit against Xavier with less than four minutes remaining in the game.

videos.headline: Providence's Bullock sends game to OT with huge block
videos.description: Trevon Bluiett's attempts a jumper to give Xavier the lead but Rodney Bullock is there and swats the ball away at the end of regulation.

videos.headline: Diallo scores tough inside bucket to give Providence the lead
videos.description: Alpha Diallo hits a tricky jumper to give Providence a 71-70 lead in overtime.

videos.headline: Providence bench lights up after Cartwright's jumper
videos.description: Kyron Cartwright hits a wide-open basket with less than one minute remaining in overtime and the Providence bench is excited.

videos.headline: Cartwright's clutch charge potential game-saving play for Providence
videos.description: With less than 7.7 seconds left in the game, Kyron Cartwright gets inside and takes the charge to stop Xavier's J.P. Macura and Providence takes over.

videos.headline: Xavier can't convert in final seconds, Providence prevails
videos.description: Down 75-72, Xavier gets the ball but Kerem Kanter doesn't release the 3-point attempt in time and Providence advances to the Big East title game.
